channel.title: CVE Feed for Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- Zoom for Android
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- Zoom for Android

item.title: CVE-2023-28599|2024-08-02T13:43:23.583Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20for%20android
item.description: Zoom clients prior to 5.13.10 contain an HTML injection vulnerability. A malicious user could inject HTML into their display name potentially leading a victim to a malicious website during meeting creation.
